input_email_body:
Subject: Security Enhancement for Medical Data

To Customer Support: I am contacting you to ask for the addition of end-to-end encryption for medical data across all relevant devices and software. This is vital to protect the privacy and safeguard sensitive patient information. I feel that this feature is crucial for both trust and adherence to regulatory guidelines My name is John Doe.. I would appreciate your timely consideration and action on this request You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Thank you for your prompt attention to this significant concern.
